item.title: Pielihueso Los Sauces 2022
item.description: 50% Cabernet Sauvignon 50% Malbec Opened and let it sit open for an hour Mendoza, Argentina Argentina Full Bodied, notes of dark fruit dark fruit Easy to drink Red Wine Smooth
item.content:encoded:
50% Cabernet Sauvignon 50% Malbec Opened and let it sit open for an hour Mendoza, Argentina Argentina

Full Bodied, notes of dark fruit dark fruit Easy to drink Red Wine Smooth

Drank with Marshie, Jimmy and Jordan

item.title: 2020 Lago Cerqueira
item.description: First tried at Puck’s Douro Valley Red is a blend of Tinta Barroca, Tinta Roriz, Touriga Franca, Touriga Nacional Red Wine Red Blend Portugal 6 months in french oak Works well with food or stand-alone
item.content:encoded:
First tried at Puck’s

Douro Valley Red is a blend of Tinta Barroca, Tinta Roriz, Touriga Franca, Touriga Nacional

Red Wine

Red Blend

Portugal

6 months in french oak

Works well with food or stand-alone

Soft tannins

Full-flavor without being heavy

Fruity

Fermented Fruit juices that’s not sweet.

Easy Drinking
